page.title: 02BURNOPFIELD.
page.content: The 1981 Census gave the following figures for{Burnopfield.Residents 3959 {Households 1620. { }There are now 23 shops in the village with the Cooperative store having closed down recently much to the dismay of many in the village.(See shops) At present there are five regular bus services through the village.There is no rail service. There were three schools in the village in the past,there is now only the one,Burnopfield County Junior Mixed and Infant School. There are several clubs and organisations in the village and a thriving Community Centre. The village is still expanding,there is a new building site being established at the moment.
